QuestData.Title: New Kid on the Clock
QuestData.Description:
Oh yeah, this pocket watch belongs to one of the stewards that help me tend to the gardens.
He's one of Nozdormu's. Orizmu, I think? I can't keep all these kids straight. Most days he stands next to that hourglass near Alexstraza's tree without moving. Or blinking.
Nozdormu's bunch have always been strange, if you ask me. But, he'll be grateful you brought this to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the pocket watch to Orizmu in the Gardens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Take the pocket watch to the Orizmu in the Gardens.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $p. Nozdormu will be pleased to have this returned.

Objectives.Objective: Take the pocket watch to Orizmu in the Gardens
